room_title: Escape room "Excalibur" by Labyrinth Escape Games in Portland
review: We did this room with 7 people. Two were strangers and 3 were newbie. We escaped with 28min left. This is not as challenging as indicated. It is very linear. We enjoyed it but it was a bit easy for us.

room_title: Escape room "Excalibur" by Labyrinth Escape Games in Portland
review: Tried the "Conspiracy" escape room with a group of eight. It was super fun, but I think eight is much too many people. I'd recommend a group of four max, two for a challenge.

room_title: Escape room "Excalibur" by Labyrinth Escape Games in Portland
review: This escape room was really well done! The decorations for the conspiracy theme were on point and enhanced the puzzles in clever ways. The puzzles themselves were also unique enough.

room_title: Escape room "Excalibur" by Labyrinth Escape Games in Portland
review: Went here for my daughter's 16th birthday and had so much fun. The person working was so nice and helpful and understanding! Hahaha. We did the Conspiracy theory room and it was really cool! The puzzles were very well done and super fun.
